resources.string: In this situation, are you obliged to stop?
Can you perform a reversing maneuver on the road behind this vertical sign?
" Are you allowed to turn back in this situation?"
" Can you change lane in such a marked place?"
" In this situation, do you have the right to opt out of using the direction indicator when changing lanes?"
Does this sign inform us about the pedestrian route?
Is the vehicle, which has the blue light flashing lights and the variable tone sound signals turned on, is a privileged vehicle?
Do you have to signal your intention to change lane if you are driving along the right edge of the road in this situation?
Do you have the right to use a sound signal to warn others of imminent danger?
Are you obliged to drive straight ahead on the left when driving straight ahead at this intersection?
"Do you have the right to use steel chains when securing the transport load? "
"Are you obliged to signal this with a direction indicator earlier by slightly changing the vehicle's path within the lane it has been occupying so far? "
"In this situation, are you allowed to overtake a car while driving a bus? "
Do you have to stop at a designated place?
